inn1.comm: on a length, right on target, coming in towards middle stump, pushed to midwicket
full in length, just outside the off stump, Hameed lets that one fly past him
brings Afridi to strike with a dab to the leg side
on a length, coming in towards middle stump line, Afridi whips it away, bottom-hand working over time and the ball runs to short fine leg and Afridi sets for a run but Hameed sends him back
legcutter, landing on the off and middle, squaring up Afridi who manages to push it to the off side.
Another legcutter, on the off and middle line, again Afridi is squared-up a touch and pushes it to the off side. End of a tight first over from Polly

Full and outside off stump, Hameed lunges across - he had lots of problems with his front foot movement in the last game, pushing it too much across and falling over a touch as a result - and lets this one go past him
short of length, on the middle stump line, cramping Hameed who short-arm jabs it to Duminy at backward square leg. Duminy is playing his first game of the series
that lunge across, front foot landing outside off stump and he manages to work a ball coming in towards him to the on side for a quick single

Anticlimax. Afridi falls. SA are delighted. Short of length, coming in from just outside off stump, Afridi goes for a pull off the front foot, didn't swivel properly and no power as a result. The ball lobs just behind mid-on and Nel backpedaled a few steps to take the catch.
length delivery on the off and middle, turned to the on side
floated outside off stump, Hameed stretches across to push it through cover point where de Villiers fumbles
length delivery on the stumps, pushed off the front foot
length delivery outside off stump, holding its line and Younis shoulders armslength delivery outside off stump, holding its line and Younis shoulders arms
leans forward to the length delivery on the off stump line, works it towards mid-on and they rush across for a quick single
pitches on a length, outside off, goes straight on and Hameed punches it to covers
on a length, outside off stump, Younis waited on the ball before steering it to third man
short of length, outside off stump, comes in a touch, nothing alarming and Hameed punches it to mid-off
short of length, landed well outside the off stump, I thought Hameed was shaping to play a shot before he shouldered arms. The ball veered further away after pitching.
closer to the off stump and this time Hameed pushes it to cover
short of length, coming in towards middle and off stump line, Hameed is on the front foot before he pushes back and works it to Gibbs at short midwicket
fuller and there is a shout of lbw from Ntini, nobody else, as Hameed is struck on the front foot while lunging across but well outside the off stump.
length delivery on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side
on a length, cutting in from just outside off stump, Younis leans forward to dead bat. He played it with soft hands and the ball spun back after landing.
rare. A wide delivery from Pollock. Way down the leg side.
on a length, around the off stump, defended to the off side
homing in on the off stump, Younis leans forward to defend to the off side
it landed just outside the off stump, came in and Younis was late in withdrawing the bat but manages to do it just in time as the ball crept past the outside edge
on the off stump line, Younis leans forward to bat and pad it away and Pollock stifles an appeal
short in length, cutting in with the usual Ntini angle, on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side.
short in length, width outside off stump, should have been put away but Hameed sends it straight to point.
again pretty short in length, closer to the off stump line, pulled past a diving Gibbs at short midwicket
leans forward to a length delivery on the off stump line and defends to the off side
fuller, outside off stump, Hameed stretches across to drive to cover
short in length, just outside off stump and Hameed punches it on the up through extra cover. That was a nice looking shot. He took care not to go too hard at it
on a length, outside off stump, defended on the front foot
lands on a length, just outside off stump and shapes away a touch, Younis remains side-on and pushes it to the off side
Younis breaks free with lovely whipped straight drive. It was fullpitched on the middle stump line and he on drove it between the bowler and mid-on.
back to short of length, on the off and middle, Younis gets behind the line to defend
length delivery shaping away outside off stump, defended on the front foot
length delivery on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
leans forward to a length delivery on the off and middle and works it to the midwicket
fuller, on the middle stump line, turned to Duminy in front of square leg
And again. It lands on a length and comes in towards off and middle, Hameed plonks his front foot across, leans over and wrists it away but he can't pierce the field
fuller and further outside off stump and Hameed drives powerfully but Botha dives at covers to make a half-stop
short in length, just outside off stump, Younis plays his whiplash square drive but straight to de Villiers at backward point
on a length this time, close to the off stump, Younis nudges it to the off side. Just a run off that over as SA keep it really tight out there.
length delivery, on the off stump line, leans forward to defend to off side
on the middle stump line, short in length and that allows Hameed to stay back to work it behind square for a single

hmm... it was fuller in length, just outside off stump and Younis decides late to have a swing. He tries to swing it over midwicket, the bat-handle rotates and the ball flies over the region between square leg and midwicket

Stunner from Gibbs at short midwicket. It was short in length, on the off stump, Hameed pulled it uppishly, not too much power behind that as the ball made contact with the inner-half of the bat, and flew to right of Gibbs who dived to cup it with both hands.
bangs it short but well outside the off stump and Yousuf has no problem it letting that one go.
full in length, outside off stump, again Younis was late in going for the drive, he was expecting a short-of-length delivery, and the ball rolls to the on side
beaten Full in length outside off stump but shaped away off the seam and Younis had a poke and a miss.
straighter, on the middle stump line, Younis leans forward, gets his bat around the front pad to turn it to midwicket
leans forward to defend
And the commentator's curse strikes again. Full pitched, though, and on the off stump, Younis leans forward to cream it straight down the ground, between the bowler and mid-off
on a good length this time, holding its line outside off stump, Yousuf  leans forward, is about to push at it before withdrawing his bat from the line
fullish outside off stump, square driven through cover point
cute late cut. It was just short of length, outside off stump, Yousuf waited on the ball before opening the bat-face late and ran it down to left of third man
length delivery on the stumps, defended on the front foot
on a length, just outside off stump, steered to backward point
lands on a length, outside off stump and holds it line, Younis adjusts to that straightening by opening the bat-face and guiding it to third man
length delivery, angling in towards the off stump, Yousuf leans forward, bat and pad close together, head over the ball as he defends. Text book defense.
beaten. Full in length, lands outside off stump and shapes away off the seam, Yousuf leans forward and ends up pushing inside the line
leans forward to a length delivery on the stumps and drives straight
outside off stump, full in length, Younis drives on the up with an open face of the bat and the ball runs away to the gully fielder.
this time to the left of that gully fielder. Shorter in length, outside off stump and Younis chops it away to left of Kallis, down to third man
leans forward to a full length delivery outside off stump and square drives to backward point
Imperious. Six over wide long-on. Younis walked down the track, Pollock tried to drag back the length but Younis leaned forward to knife it through the line. On the up and over long-on.
on a length, on the stumps, defended to the on side. "Nice Polly nice," says Boucher.

Oh! what a tame end. SA strike again.  It was a length delivery on the stumps, whipped past square leg where Botha  rushes across to field. Yousuf turns for the second run but is sent back by Younis but Yousuf can't beat the throw. It went one bounce to Boucher who broke the stumps. Poor running between the wickets.
welcomes Malik with a bouncer and he ducks under
Full in length, outside off stump, left alone
full in length, defended to the off side
shuffles across to whip a length delivery past square leg
full and outside off stump, left alone.
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to cover
full in length, on the middle stump line, left alone
on target rightaway, it was on a length, around off stump, pushed to covers
well outside off stump, Younis tries to square drive but can't reach it
beaten. It was a length delivery that shaped away off the seam and past the outside edge
half-volley outside off stump and Younis puts it away without any fuss. He leaned forward to cover drive it.
back to the good length, outside off, shaping away and defended to the off side
fuller, homing in on the off stump, Younis had plonked his front leg across and quickly arrested that movement and got his bat around it to push the ball across the line to midwicket
short in length, just outside off stump and that length allows Younis to wait on the ball before chopping it away past a diving Kallis at gully
short in length, just outside off stump but Malik whips it away past square leg for a single.
on a length, outside off stump and Younis dabs it to point.
comes in from short of length, on the middle and off, worked through midwicket for a single
banged in short, outside off stump, stays there and Malik sways away from the line, Malik was troubled by the bouncers on a few occasions in the Test series
another bouncer, again outside off stump, swayed away again
banged in short, climbs just below chest-high, on the middle stump line, Younis stands tall to get on top of the bounce and short-arm jabs it away past square leg
slightly short in length, width outside off stump, Malik lashes out at the width and pings the point boundary
straighter, short in length, Malik defends back down the track
short in length, outside off stump, holds its line, Malik, square drives, bat away from the body, to point
fuller, outside off stump and Malik is late in getting forward- anticipating another short of length delivery - and gets a thickish outside edge on the drive and it runs away to wide third man
short in length and again some width outside off stump, Malik punches it on the up through extra cover and by the time Smith pulls it back from near the ropes they run three
Malik is on the offensive. Another short in length delivery, outside off stump, holding its line and Malik fists it away through cover point.
full in length, outside off stump, Malik waits on the ball before cutting it away  to third man
full in length, outside off stump and straightens, Younis shoulders arms
fuller, closer to the off stump, Younis leans forward and ends up mistiming a drive to mid-off
hits the deck short of length, outside off stump, comes in a touch, pushed to the off side
on a length, on the off and middle, punched on the up to mid-on. No chance for a run, though.
fullish and outside off stump, left alone. Morkel has been guilty of offering width outside off stump.
on a length, on the off and middle line, turned to right of mid-on for a single.
full, a low full toss outside off stump but it swings away late and Younis gets a outside edge to point as he tries to whip it across the line through mid-on
shuffles right across the sticks, ends up outside off stump and whips a length delivery from there past square leg for a single.
short of length, close to the off stump, Malik forces it off the back foot to point
full in length, just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
short in length, on the off stump line, pulled to deep square leg
on a length, defended to the off side
length delivery on the stumps, pushed down the track
short in length, coming in towards off stump, dabbed to left of backward point for a single
banged in short of length, outside off stump, pulled away
full in length, outside off stump, Younis shuffles across and gets almost outside the line of the ball and whips it to midwicket
on a length, on the off stump, wristed past square leg
fullish, outside off stump, YOunis again shuffles across and tries to whip it away to the onside and the ball runs off the inner half of the bat past square leg
short in length, on the middle stump line, Malik works it past square leg for another single
again  that shuffle and he turns a full pitched delivery on the off and middle to right of mid-on for a single
full in length, on the middle and off stump, Younis pushes it early, the ball stops on him a touch and it went uppishly towards mid-on but it didn't carry to Ntini at mid-on
short in length outside off stump, waits on the ball before chopping it to third man
on the off stump line, steered to point
short in length, slower one, around 116 kmph, again Younis is a tad early into the shot but checks it and ends up pushing it to wide mid-on
edged away. Short in length, outside off stump, holding its line, Younis stabs at it, inside the line and gets a outside edge between the 'keeper and Kallis at gully
floated on the off and middle, driven to long-on for a single

flighted well outside off stump, Younis leans forward, tries to whip it across the line to long-on but the ball is wider than he expected and gets a leading edge, in the air, well to the left of Botha
works it through the on side this time for a single
charges out to a flighted delivery and has a mighty heave at it but gets a inside edge on to the boot
on the middle and off, turned to the on side
And again. He has slowed down the pace and is trying to turn it from the off stump.
short of length, outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
banged in short and it sails over Younis
walked out down the track, shuffling towards the off side in the process, ending up yorking himself and he stabbed it to the on side
low full toss, on the off and middle, whipped to midwicket

another full pitched delivery, just outside off stump, Younis leans forward to drive towards mid-off and sets off for a quick run. Botha has a shy, misses and never mind, Younis would have be in even if it had hit
short of length, on the off and middle, Malik works it to right of mid-on
floated on the off and middle, short in length and that allows Malik to stay back and punch it through long-on
tossed-up, again slow through the air, outside off stump and Younis doesn't have any pace to work with and mistimes a drive back to Botha
on the off stump line, swept to Smith at backward square leg

nice. Again slow through the air, floated on the middle, straightens, nudged to the on side to right of short midwicket where de Villiers swoops on the ball and fires in a throw at Boucher who whips the bails off. Malik had made it just in time. It was referred upstairs; not out was the verdict
flighted outside off stump, a tad too full and that allows Malik to lean forward and whip it to long-on
outside off stump and driven to cover. This is the  best that Botha has bowled in the series.
outside off, driven straight ot mid-off
slower ball, wide outside off, Malik swipes it away to the square boundary
Short of length, on the hips, clipped past square leg
length delivery on the stumps, driven back, Nel dives to his right to make a fine stop
Fuller , on middle and leg, Younis tries to whip it away but misses and is struck on the pads, going sown leg though
Drifting down leg, Younis helps it off his pads towards fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg, flicked into square leg
short and flat on leg stump, he gets into position and flat-bats it out to deep square leg, where Nel dives on the ropes
tossed up on off, he comes down and drives uppishly but the ball doesnt carry to Botha
fifty for Younis, who gets back and slashes a wide delivery wide of short third man
full and flat, he uses his feet and on-drives to Pollock
tight delivery, full on off stump and he gets forward to defend
good length outside off stump, Malik uses the feet and defends to cover
a touch fuller on middle and off, pushed to extra cover with a shuffle of the feet
a touch wider and shorter, Malik drops the wrists and places it through the gap at gully and runs hard for the second as third man does duty on the ropes
angled down leg stump and Malik gets bat on it, clipping down to Ntini at fine leg
good length delivery coming into off stump, Younis waits on it and drops the hands over it, picking up one as Boucher runs forward and fields
too full down leg stump, Younis cant connect but its a wide
back of a length on off stump, Malik gets behind the line and defends it back
tossed up on off stump, Younis shimmies down the track and connects well, lofting Botha over long-on for his second six
much fuller outside off but Younis spots it quickly, sweeping across the line and out to Morkel at deep square leg
flatter delivery on middle and off, he gets tall and punches to Pollock at mid-on
tossed up on off stump, Younis defends it back
a bit too full on off stump and Younis sweeps through square leg for one
quicker and flatter, spinning in, Malik backs away to leg and cuts to point
whack. Short in length and well outside off stump, Malik slaps it through extra cover. Nel rushes across from deep cover to make a diving stop near the ropes.
another short in length delivery, on the off stump line, pulled weakly to midwicket
short on off stump, steered away to third man
full toss on leg stump, inside edge to fine leg, Ntini
slower ball on leg stump, flicked awya to square leg
fulltoss again on the legs and turned away to square leg
on the stumps, hit to mid-on... they think of a single and decide against it
short and wide, chopped away to third man
walks across, slower ball... single to right of midwicket
huge shout for lbw... woody sound was there... replay shows inside edge, which would have carried it beyond leg stump
length ball.. slowr, offcutter, on the stumps... played to midwicket
square driven on the up through cover point.
Short and wide, cut to the left of sweeper cover
length ball, defended back to the bolwer
big front foot down planted down the wicket and played to mid on

slower ball, 119k, does the trick. malik checks the drive and offers an easy catch to smith at mid-off. this has been a good innings by malik, and this partnership has lifted pakistan from a precarious situation
on a length, on the off and middle, wristed to square leg
slipping down leg side, misses a glance and it runs off the thigh pad to fine leg boundary
picks up a single to behind square leg
slower one, 104.2 kmph, off cutter, fullish, on the off and middle, nudged to the on side
another slow off cutter ,on the middle stump, Misbah waits on the ball before turning it to square leg
And again. Deja-vu at Multan
hmm..... and again. Pollock's change of pace is the faster one these days!
You can guess right? Yep, another slower one, only change is this was outside off and it was steered to point.
Fullish, on the off and middle, driven to short midwicket
Kallis is on the same trip as Pollock. 113k this time. Younis plays it back to him
flicked to fine leg
length ball driven down the ground to long on
outside the off stump, shortish, but misbah struggling for timing and plays it straight to point
another slower, turned away towards midwicket
on the stumps, accurate. batsman can't do anything with it
full on legs. turned away to square leg
slower ball. misbah finally gets off the mark, turning it towards squareleg. this was the 10th delivery he faced
short, younis sees it early, rocks back, and pulls it to the squareleg fence.
wide of off, steered away to third man
younis walks down the track, kallis shortens the length. younis gets a single to long on
slower, short one... 101k... pulled to midwicket
this one was a regular short one, and younis pulls it over midwicket. thank you very much!
short and wide this time, younis cuts it to sweeper cover
another slower ball, on stumps, misbah just plays it to point. still struggling for timing, misbah
slow and wide of off stump. younis waits for it, opens the face and places the square drive beautifully between sweeper cover and thirdman
on a length, just outside off stump, Younis leans forward to push it to point region
full pitched outside off stump, Younis leans forward to caress it away through cover for a single
fullish, outside off stump, driven crisply but straight to cover
short of length this time, coming in towards off stump, Misbah steers it to left of backward point where Gibbs makes a fine diving stop
from wide of the crease, full and on the middle and leg, flicked away behind square leg
on a length, outside off stump, Younis stretches forward to square drive to left of sweeper cover where Botha rushes at the ball to prevent the second run.
Full pitched outside off stump, driven to cover

Big wicket. Younis is gone. Banged in short of length, outside off stump, bounced a bit, Younis tried to pull it from there, was beaten for the pace and more by the extra bounce and the ball lobs to Gibbs at midwicket
short in length, outside off stump, mistimes a cut to cover point and they hesitate before completing the single.
Full in length, pushed straight to cover
banged in short, at the body, is late on the pull and he ends up fending it to the on side.

Nel strikes with a change of length. This one was fuller, just short of driveable length and Misbah, stuck on the back foot, was late on the drive. He didn't quite lean into his drive and ended up nicking it behind. SA are tightening the screws again.
on a length, outside off stump, steered past the diving point fielder (Gibbs) and picks up a single to sweeper cover
slanted across Rehman who lets that one go through to Boucher
short of length, on the middle and off, clipped to square leg for a single
full in length, homing in on the off stump, Kamran gets right behind the line and plays it quietly back down the track
on a length, around the off stump, driven to cover
creamed through cover. Fuller in length, just outside off stump and Akmal leans into his cover drive.
from round the stumps, on a length, just outside off stump and Rehman offers no stroke
pushes a length delivery around off stump to cover
again from round the stumps, on a length, just outside off stump and Rehman guides it to left of slip where Smith dives to make a half-stop
slower, fuller, outside off stump, square driven to point
length delivery, outside off stump, pushed through cover point
short of length, at the ribs, turned to the on side
fullish, outside off stump, mistimes a drive to the leg side
full in length, on the leg and middle, worked past square leg for a single
full in length outside off stump, sliced away through point
full pitched, on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
slower one, full in length, outside off stump and Akmal is early into the drive and is beaten
on a length, around the middle and off stump, driven uppishly, as he checks his drive, to cover
flighted from round the stumps, on the middle and leg, jabbed away to the leg side
slower in the pace, turning away from the off stump, swatted to the on side
on the middle, turning slightly, dabbed to square leg
beaten by the arm-ball. It landed just outside off stump and came in straight, Rehman stabs at it and it must have brushed his pad and went past Akmal
leans forward to a length delivery on the middle stump, again not much turn, to behind square leg
on the middle and leg, turned to the on side
homing in on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
full pitched, outside off stump, square driven to point
on the middle and leg, on a length, Akmal gets his bat around the front pad and he can only send it straight to midwicket
on a length, on the middle and off line, played to covers
again on a length, around the off stump, Akmal runs it down to third man for a single
full pitched outside off stump, pushed towards extra cover

floated outside off stump, pushed to right of short cover and Rehman runs for a non existent run and a surprised Akmal sends him back. Rehman puts his hand up as a apology. That would have been suicidal
on the middle and leg, swept away behind square leg
tossed up full outside off stump, Akmla tries to sweep and the ball rolls off the pad through  short third man region
floated up, on the middle and leg, driven through the on side
quickish this time, just outside off stump and Akmal is beaten on the cut

banged in short but down the leg side and Rehman was pretty late on the pull. Morkel appeals for a catch, Boucher goes up late after seeing the bowler appeal but they can't fool Aleem Dar who calls it a wide. Nice try Morkel
short of length, outside off stump, steered to third man
full pitched, on the off and middle line, leaned forward to drive it through the mid-on region
slower one, 110.8 kmph, on the off and middle, Rehman waits on the ball before pushing it through cover point
beaten by the slower one. Around 114k, off cutter and it went past the outside edge as Rehman tried to dab it away to third man
shuffles right across the sticks and is again beaten by the slower one. 115k this time and again he tries  to adjust to the change of pace by attempting an dab to third man but ...
third time lucky for Rehman. Another slower one, around 111k, short in length, off cutter and Rehman gives up the cute dabs and opts for a swat across the line to deep midwicket
from round the stumps, full and on the off stump line, opens the bat-face and steers to cover point region
charges out and attempts a heave but Botha doesn't panic, keeps it slow through the air and it dips to strike the bottom-half of the bat and rolls to the on side.

flighted, again slow through the air, Akmal tries to reverse sweep, misses and it runs off the back leg, going down leg side, though, and runs away to fine leg boundary. Smith runs after it and tries a sliding stop but his front foot probably just touched the rope. It was referred upstairs and a boundary is given.
The slog sweep makes its entry. Akmal cleared the front foot and swunga full delivery to the cow corner
quickish, outside off, a tad short in length and is cut to deep point

skips down the track and drives to long-off for a single. The crowd roared as they saw Rehman charging out and pressed the mute button when they saw the ball go along the ground to long-on. The charm of the slog overs.
takes the front foot outside the line and drives a full pitched delivery to long-on.
full again, on the middle stump line, worked straight to midwicket.

slow off cutter, 117.2 kmph, Akmal fails to connect to the leg side, misses and the ball rolls to the off side off the pad. Morkel rushes after it, picks up, turns, throws at the non-striker's end, misses and the crowd roar. Akmal should have made it anyway
short in length and Rehman swat-pulls to deep midwicket
banged in short of length, over the leg stump line, maybe just down; Rehman shapes to pull before ducking. Wide called. Harsh call.
slanted across Rehman who has a dab and a miss.
A swing and a miss this time. More ambitious than the previous delivery, Rehman tried to slash at a slower one, angling away from him but no wood on leather
slower one, 112.1 k but Akmal picks it well. He backed away a touch, waited on the slower one before carving it to wide long-off boundary.
yorker length delivery, again Akmal backed away to the leg side and jabbed it away down the ground for a single

dropped by Pollock, running in from fine leg. It was delivered from round the stumps, on a length, outside off stump, Rehman went for a slog across the line, skied it high in the air towards fine leg. Boucher ran after, Pollock ran towards it and Boucher pulled out at the last minute to avoid collision, Pollock go under the ball but clanged it
full toss above the waist-high, Rehman slashed it and the ball ran away off the toe-end of the bat to third man boundary. No free hit as its not a front-foot no ball
outside off stump, a slash and a miss
slashed over a leaping Boucher. Slower one, short in length, Rehman tried to swing across the line, got the top edge that carried the ball over Boucher
outside off stump, sliced past point
yorker outside off stump, Akmal charges out, tries to dig it out but the ball whizzes under the bat
another one, almost yorker length, on the off stump line, jabbed to extra cover
swung to the long leg boundary. Rehman is having some fun out there. He leans forward and pulls off the front foot
Yorker cleans him up. Full. swings in late from just outside leg stump, Rehman had moved outside leg stump, stabbed at it, missed and the ball crashed into the leg stump
brings Akmal to strike with a nudge to backward point
fullish, around the off stump, driven powerfully to deep cover and he retains the strike

And this one disappears over the deep midwicket boundary, much to the delight of the crowd. Tossed-up, on the off and middle line, Akmal, clears the front wicket, and slog-sweeps it high and over the ropes
Botha gets his first wicket of the series. Floated on the off stump line, Akmal topedged a slog across the line to present a dolly to short third man. Akmal falls after a neat little cameo
flatter, full and on the middle stump line, Gul swings it uppishly, two bounces to deep midwicket fielder
on the leg stump line, tries to swing it away but fails to make contact and it runs off the pad
Botha gets his second victim. Some joy at the end for him. Slow through the air, on the middle stump line, Gul has another swing and picks out the deep midwicket fielder this time.
moves outside leg stump, Botha follows him with a fullish one at the blockhole, Rao tries to jab it away and gets a outside edge to the off side.

inn2.comm: starts off with a full one, outside off and moving away, left alone
full in length, it moved away in the air late but Smith leaned across, covered the movement before steering it through cover point.
well outside the off stump and it's a wide.
nice movement away. In the air to start off and then off the track. It landed on a length, outside off stump and moved away. Smith chose to leave it alone
shuffles across before shouldering arms to a full one angling away from him
lands on a length, outside off stump and moves away appreciably off the seam, left alone again
closer to the off stump but fuller too, too full perhaps, and Smith drives straight down the ground
full in length, outside off stump, holds its line, Gibbs leans across, covers the off stump before shouldering arms
fuller, just outside off stump, Gibbs caresses it through extra cover for couple of runs
length delivery outside off stump, left alone.
overpitched outside off stump and Gibbs creams it through extra cover. No swing nor movement and is beautifully put away
straighter, on the middle stump line, too full again and Gibbs has no problem in whipping it past square leg
on a length, on the middle and off stump line, Smith leans forward to push it to cover
shaving past the off stump. It landed on a length, just outside the off stump and cut back in, Gibbs didn't quite cover the off stump and shouldered arms.
another nip-backer, on the middle stump, Gibbs is struck on the thigh pad. It would have gone over
leans forward to dab a length delivery on the middle stump to square leg
well outside off stump, full in length and Smith is not interested. SA need 214 to win from 47.2 overs
slightly short in length, again Smith shuffles across - he has been doing that tonight repeatedly- and dabs it to on side
hits the deck short of length, on the off stump, pushed to cover .
length delivery outside off stump and Smith steered it to third man
full in length, on the middle stump line, whipped through midwicket
full in length, outside the off stumps, Gibbs stays back and tries to force it through cover but ends up mistiming it to cover
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed down the track
fuller, in length, outside off stump, square driven to point
overpitched outside off stump, driven to mid-off
shuffles across to the sticks and wrists one on the middle stump line to square leg
short in length, just outside off stump, cut to wide third man and they rush back for the second run
hits the deck short of length, on the middle and leg and held its line, Smith, on the move, was beaten by the straightening and by the extra bounce and is struck on the thigh pad
on a length, outside off stump, cut to point
bad delivery, drifting on the legs and that's Smith strong area; he whips it past square leg
on a length, coming in towards off stump, Gibbs stabs at it, bottom-hand coming off the handle, and gets a inside edge to pad
Gibbs goes down town. He charged down the track, backing to the legside in the process and knifed a length delivery over mid-off.
cute. He plonked his left leg across the line and swat-flicked a length delivery over square leg. Risky but effective this time.
almost dragged on to the stumps. On a length, outside off stump, Gibbs jabbed at it, trying to run it to third man and got a inside edge that took the ball dangerously close to the off stump
banged in short but sails down the leg side
whipped through wide mid-on. Full pitched ,on the middle and leg, Gibbs waited on it before whipping it away through the on side. Elegant. Gibbs is making batting look very easy out there
on the middle and leg, turned to the on side
full and down the leg side
plays and misses... landed on the length and moved slightly away
shortish ball turned away wristily, but lands just short of shortmiidwicket
short on off stump... swiped away towards leg side, underside edge goes for four to square leg
length ball, straight, defended to mid-on
outside off, full, left alone
length ball, outside off, gibbs just stands tall and drives it through covers. there were five fielders in the ring on off side. not one moved.
full and wide, going down leg stump, for a wide
Full straight, played to mid-off
full on off stump, pushed to point
Full on leg stump, flicked towards square leg for two
full on leg stump, played straight to mid-on
short on off stump, steered away to third man for one
full on the off stump, played straight to mid-off
full on middle and off, turned to midwicket
length ball outside off stump, Smith hits with too-much bottom hand and chops into the ground in front of point
a touch wider and Smith opens the face, steering into the gap for one to third man, nicely played, late, and over the ball
length delivery outside off stump, Gibbs pokes it off the front foot and into the gap behind backward point, running the first one hard and getting a couple
steps across his stump, trying to lap the ball from outside off to fine leg, but the ball clips his leg well outside the line of impact, then rolling to short fine leg
almost! Asif pitches short, Gibbs rocks back and cracks it just over backward point's fingers! Would've been an excellent catch it he'd gotten a hand on that blistering shot
short and wide, Smith gets back and laces it wide of point for one out to Asif, running across from third man
better delivery, full and straight and Gibbs, initially looking to work across the line, ends up playing it back to Rao
heave ho! Gibbs dances down the track, swinging across the line, and missing completely!
good length just outside off, Gibbs pushes to backward point
back of a length, pitching on leg and slanting down to catch Gibbs high on the kneeroll ... Rao appeals but Aleem Dar isnt interested ... balls runs to backward point for a leg-bye
stands and pokes at one outside off, missing the line

huge appeal for lbw and its given by Bowden. Done by the slider. It landed on a length, on the middle and leg stump line and moved towards leg. Gibbs went forward, then, back, was caught in the crease and was struck in front of leg stump. It was sliding down leg and would have probably missed leg stump. Gibbs was batting very fluently and this is a big blow
floated outside off stump, driven to cover
quickish, outside off again, steered to backward point
again outside off stump, Pollock pushes it to backward point again
this one is on the off stump line and is defended on the front foot
short and width offered outside off stump, Pollock went back to cut it through point  to the boundary
on a length, around the off stump, Smith punches it on the up, through the line and to left of mid-off
length delivery, holding its line, on the off stump, Pollock pushes it back down the track. SA need 161 to win at 4.2 runs per over
slightly short in length, just slightly but that's enough for Pollock to pull it through wide mid-on

drama! Comical. Pollock charged out at Rao who digs it in short and at the body. Pollock didn't know how to react and just ducked in and was struck. Smith couldn't but laugh and he slowly went down the track to chat with Pollock, who looked equally bemused
leans forward to defend a length delivery
yorker length, on the legs, Pollock jabs at it and it runs off the boot
almost caught at cover . Floated outside off stump, Pollock drove on the front foot and it fell just short of a diving Gul at cover
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
again on that line, Smith goes back this time to work it through square leg for a single
slower, short in length, outside off stump, Pollock went back and across to dab it to left of Gul who is standing at short third man now
floated on the stumps, Smith went back again to punch it to long-on
drifted in, on the middle stump line, stabbed away to the square leg region
backs away, Rao follows him with a length delivery and Pollock turns it to midwicket
banged in short, Pollock shapes to pull before deciding to go down under
whack. The pinch hitter is doing his job. Again he backs away a touch before heaving a full pitched delivery over mid-on.
fuller, going for the yorker, ends up as a low dipping full toss outside off, Pollock drives but makes contact with the toe-end of the bat and the ball rolls away to the off side
another bouncer but this one sails well above Polly's head and a no-ball is called. Since it's not a front-foot no-ball, the next ball won't be a free hit.
outside off, on a length, guided to backward point
steps down the track, Rao shortens the length and Pollock adjusts to push it through mid-on
full in length, outside off stump, steered to point
floated outside off stump, turns slightly and Pollock slaps it through cover point
slider on the middle stump line, whipped through midwicket
flighted full outside off stump, outside off stump and Smith leans forward to play a lovely off drive through wide mid-off.
flighted delivery, from round the stumps, full and turning outside off, Pollock is rooted to the crease and tries to square drive but can't connect
tries to sweep a delivery outside off and is struck on the pad
another one outside off stump, another failed attempt at the sweep shot
floated outside off stump, Pollock drills it through extra cover
from over the sticks to left-handed Smith, on the middle and leg, wristed past square leg
full and outside off stump, Pollock sweeps on the front foot to long-leg boundary
lands outside leg stump, a offspinner this time, turns in, worked to midwicket
slider, landing outside leg stump and striking Smith on the pad. Afridi appeals but that can't be given
floated outside off stump, another slider, Smith tries to square drive through cover pointm misses and Akmal whips the bails off.
flighted on the off and middle, Smith went for a drive with a shut-face of the bat and almost ballooned the ball to Malik at midwicket
lands on the off and middle, slides away and Smith pushes it to the off side for a single
conventional legbreak this time, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
lands well outside off stump, Smith tries to sweep it and is struck on the pad
leans forward to push a delivery turning in from outside off to cover
slow in the air, again outside off stump but Smith manages to get his sweep right this time and picks up a single
on the off stump line, turning away slightly, driven to cover
on the off stump again, defended on the front foot. "Well bowled Rehman," screams Akmal
on the off, going on straight, driven to the off side
flighted delivery, full and dipping in front of middle, stabbed away to the on side
yorker length, on the leg and middle stump line, turned slightly to strike Smith on the pad and went away towards slip
outside off stump, pushed to cover point for a single
full and outside off, leans forward to take it on the pad
flighted delivery outside off stump, Pollock drives pleasingly to long-off
walks across the sticks and then comes down the track in an effort to whip a ball across the line but is struck on the pad
short in length, arm-ball outside off stump, pulled away to long-on
on the middle and leg, Smith goes back to turn it to backward square leg
tossed-up, outside off stump and Smith goes down on his knee to sweep it to long leg
flatter, quicker, outside off, chopped to short third man
fuller, slower, on the off stump, Pollock mistimes a drive back down the track
on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
lands on the off and middle, spins away to evade an  sweep shot and Akmal gathers
outside leg stump, full in length, and it ran off the pad as Smith failed to connect with his drive
tossed up, dipping on the middle, driven to long-off
slightly short, outside off stump, cut to left of deep point
on the middle stump line, turning down leg and Smith plays a sweep shot to long leg
fullish, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
flighted full on the middle stump line, worked past square leg
goes back to turn it through midwicket
slightly short in length, outside off stump, Pollock shows why he is a good player of spin by going back, waiting on the ball, for the turn to play out before cutting it through backward point
leans forward to drive, misses and is struck on the pad. It landed outside leg stump, though
gets this one down to long-on for a single
slightly short in length, on the middle and off stump line, pulled away through midwicket
goes on the back foot to work it to midwicket region
slows up the pace, flights the ball more and  Pollock is made to wait on the front foot and pushes it to extra cover

quicker one ,on the middle stump line, Smith is late in getting his bat down, is almost trapped - Afridi had his arms up in expectation, ready to appeal, when Smith made contact just in time and gets a leading edge to the off side
turns a length delivery on the back foot through midwicket
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
on the middle stump line, turns slightly and Pollock pushes it back down the track
flatter, quicker, just outside off stump, punched to deep cover
shuffles across the sticks and sweeps a delivery outside off to long leg.
slipping down the leg side, paddled away to fine leg for couple of runs. Oops no .. Dar signals it as legbyes.
goes back to punch a delivery outside off to cover
tossed-up, full and outside off, Smith leaned forward to drive through extra cover. It should have been fielded by the cover fielder but he lunges to his right rather lazily and gives away four runs.
goes back to push a delivery on the stumps for a single
beaten. Afridi slowed up the pace, gave it more air and it landed outside off stump before sliding away. Smith was sucked into a loose drive
full but on the midde and leg, flicked to long leg for a single
length ball, easily pushed down to mid-on
short and easily pulled to midwicket
full on off stump, smith leans it, gets a single to mid-on. that's his fifty, a responsible knock. a captains seeing his side through
full on stumps, forward defensive... things just drifting along for pakistan
full on leg stump, pollock gets him foot down to the pitch and turns it to square leg
fullish, a bit of drift, smith checks his shot and defends it back to bowler
Full on leg, turned away easily.
full on middle stump, whipped away in classic smith fashion. midwicket raises his hand for boundary fielder who wasn't

This time asif overcompensates, and smith hits it through extracover. Not the best of timing, Misbah runs from sweeper cover and dives, makes a half stop it, but the ball rolls over to hit the boundary rope. Wait a minute the rope had been moved by the fielder. It's three only
Back of a length, pushed to cover
Full on stumps, played to mid-on
full outside off stump, smith tries to sweep and misses. can't be given oiut as it hit outside the line
on the stumps, paddled to fine leg by pollock. that's his fifty. He will love this, every bowler does
tossed up on middle and leg, worked back to Rehman
quicker on middle and leg, tucked straight to midwicket
tossed up well outside off stump, he goes for the sweep and misses, Rehman appeals but Smith was so very far outside the line
makes room to leg and cracks a length delivery safely up and over point, the ball dropping safely in no-man's-land
slower ball, Asif rolling the fingers over it and Pollock uses the width to cream it over extra cover for three more, raising the 100-run stand
back of a length outside off, Smith opens the face and chops into the gap at gully for one down to third man
length delivery sliding down the pads and Pollock whips that efficiently into the gap at midwicket for more easy runs, this is easy batting from Pollock
good length outside off stump and Pollock effortlessly squeezes it through the big gap at point for a couple more
now he bangs in it short on the stumps and Pollock helps it on its way with a controlled pull into the gap at short fine leg
full on middle and off, squeezed to cover this time
oh ho! Full and flat on leg stump, Pollock gets forward and paddles it up in air, Akmal turns and stumbles and doesnt make any effort to dive for the catch ... sums up Pakistan's evening
moves over the stumps, bowls it full and flat and Smith uses his feet to steer it towards point
again full and flat outside off stump, Smith works it across the line to mid-on
flatter on middle and leg, spinning away from Pollock, who shuffles and works it into the gap at square leg for one more
flat outside off, Smith reaches for it and drags it across the line to midwicket
good length on leg stump, easily tapped to midwicket for one
back of a length outside off, Smith cracks it to Hameed at backward point
comes down the track and takes one hand off the bat handle as he drags it across the line, and a good diving stop at midwicket saves runs
too full on this occasion and Smith uses his feet, hitting up and over mid-on
on a length, outside off stump, slanting away, slashed away to third man
Another one disappears into the midwicket boundary. Full ish, on the middle stump line, Pollock clears the front foot and dispatches it over midwicket. SA are running hot here
full and on the middle and leg, swept away for a single
full and well outside off stump, carved to deep point
on the middle and leg, line jabbed away to the on side
full, on the middle, Smith leans forward, ends up yorking himself as he tries to whip it across
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
charges down the track, Rehman drags back the length and also slows up the pace, Smith adjusts to swat it away past midwicket
on the middle and leg, whipped to wide midwicket for couple of runs
full in length, on the middle and leg, pulled to deep midwicket
banged in really short and Pollock lets that one go over him
charges out , backing to the leg side in the process and slices a length delivery over wide cover
swings this one through midwicket. SA need just 37 runs to win. The final ODI is going to be maha mighty interesting
Now Smith goes over the top. Full in length, on the middle and leg, Smith knives through the line, on the up, over mid-on
dropped by Gul. short in length, on the stumps, Smith pushes early and sends it straight to Gul who clangs it
full and flighted, on the off stump, driven to cover
backed away to punch a delivery on the stumps through extra cover
threatens to back away before walking back into line and turns a delivery on the stumps to deep midwicket
full in length, outside off stump, Pollock flat-bats it over the leaping bowler to long-off for a single
Ah! Pollock backed away to the leg side, Gul banged it in short , Pollock arched back to upper cut it through the slip region
Pollock is hastening the end. Again, he backs away to the leg side and lofts a fullpitched delivery on the middle and leg over long-on.
He is caught at long leg but hold on its a no ball! Banged in short, Pollock topedged a pull straight to long leg. It was a big front foot no ball and we got a free hit coming up.

oh ho! he is cleaned up but he won't be out since this is free hit. A slower one, full  in length, on the off stump, Smith shuffled to the leg side, tried a heave across the line, missed it completely and the off stump was pegged back.
length delivery on the middle stump, Smith pushes it early and hits it uppishly through mid-on region to long-on for a single
Another no ball. It landed short of length and was pulled to Misbah at long leg. Again it will be Smith to face. Let's see what he can do with this free hit
from round the stumps, on the middle and leg, Smith has a heave, misses and the ball clips the pad and rolls away.
slower one from round the stumps, Pollock backs away, waits on the ball and guides it to backward point
full and on the off stump line, driven to mid-on region for a single
short in length, Pollock misses to connect with his pull shot and it climbs over the stumps
banged in short and it climbs over Pollock who ducks
There's four of 'em. Full pitched and outside off stump, Pollock smokes it over extra cover. Clean strike.
And he is gone now. No hundred but it was a fab innings.A slower one, landed on a length, on the off stump line, Pollock backed away and flat-batted it high in the air to long-off
retains the strike with a push towards mid-off
full and on the off stump line, gets a thickish edge on his drive and picks up a single to cover point
on the middle stump line, coming in, defended on the front foot
lands on a length, on the middle stump line, turns away, dabbed with the turn to point
fullish, on the stumps, driven to cover
quicker, outside off stump, punched straight between the legs of Yasir Hameed at backward point.
lands outside off stump and stays there, Kallis lets it go to Akmal.
bouncer that sails well above Smith's head, No wide called.
full in length, on the middle and leg, Smith pulled it straight to deep midwicket. More delay to the end as a new batsman walks in.  It was a captain's knock, though.
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to cover
And that's it. South Africa clinch a facile win. Full in length, slipping to the legs, clipped past square leg.
